[Divine Wall](/Feats.aspx?ID=5917) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
You're wielding a shield

**Requirements**
You're wielding a shield.

</column>

---

You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you. All spaces adjacent to you are [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) for your enemies.
